description: Smoked tofu is delicious with creamy butterbeans, crunchy almonds and roasted vegetables in this easy one pan meal.
name: Smoked Tofu, Butterbean & Almond Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, peeled and chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Par boil the potatoes in a large saucepan filled with water for 8-10 minutes and drain.
Tip the potatoes, red onion, capsicums, garlic and butterbeans into a large roasting tin. Drizzle with a tablespoon of olive oil and roast for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and add the tofu, olives and almonds and sprinkle over the smoked paprika. Drizzle the remaining oil, mix well to coat and roast for 8 minutes.
Remove from the oven, scatter with fresh parsley and lemon zest, squeeze over the lemon juice and serve.
